scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series, composed of nine boxes, covers the period from December 1931 to December 1935. In addition to his service as Lieutenant Governor, papers in this series reflect Chandler's activities as a private attorney and politician. Files within the series appear alphabetically. Papers of major significance in the series include those pertaining to Acting Governor Chandler's move to enact a primary law for the 1935 gubernatorial race.
